Package nxt.nav

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CSListener
    An interface to be implemented by all classes that wish to listen for the color sensor's detection of a grid line.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CSCorrection
    A class that implements correction on the position when grid lines are detected on the floor by a color sensor.
    CSLocalization
    A class used to perform localization using the color sensor.
    Navigation
    A class used to navigate the robot on the field.
    Odometer
    A class which keeps track of and updates the position of the robot.
    USCorrection
    A class used to correct the odometer while traveling through a one tile gap with known obstacles on the sides.
    USLocalization
    A class used to localize the robot using the wall and ultrasonic sensor data.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
    An enum for the four cardinal directions.
